client_password.description: Password (Accepts any printable ASCII character. Must be within 8-25 characters, and include numbers, lowercase and uppercase letters. Must not be the same as the user's email address).

date_first_contact.description: [Optional] Date of first contact, format: `yyyy-mm-dd` in GMT timezone.

email_consent.description: [Optional] Boolean value: 1 or 0, indicating whether the client has given consent for marketing emails.

gclid_url.description: [Optional] Google Click Identifier to track source.

signup_device.description: [Optional] Show whether user has used mobile or desktop.

utm_ad_id.description: [Optional] Identifier of particular ad. Value must match Regex pattern to be recorded

utm_adgroup_id.description: [Optional] Identifier of ad group in the campaign. Value must match Regex pattern to be recorded

utm_adrollclk_id.description: [Optional] Unique identifier of click on AdRoll ads platform. Value must match Regex pattern to be recorded

utm_campaign.description: [Optional] Identifies a specific product promotion or strategic campaign such as a spring sale or other promotions. Value must match Regex pattern to be recorded

utm_campaign_id.description: [Optional] Identifier of paid ad campaign. Value must match Regex pattern to be recorded

utm_content.description: [Optional] Used to differentiate similar content, or links within the same ad. Value must match Regex pattern to be recorded

utm_fbcl_id.description: [Optional] Unique identifier of click on Facebook ads platform. Value must match Regex pattern to be recorded

utm_gl_client_id.description: [Optional] Unique visitor identifier on Google Ads platform. Value must match Regex pattern to be recorded

utm_medium.description: [Optional] Identifies the medium the link was used upon such as: email, CPC, or other methods of sharing. Value must match Regex pattern to be recorded

utm_msclk_id.description: [Optional] Unique click identifier on Microsoft Bing ads platform. Value must match Regex pattern to be recorded

utm_source.description: [Optional] Identifies the source of traffic such as: search engine, newsletter, or other referral. Value must match Regex pattern to be recorded

utm_term.description: [Optional] Used to send information related to the campaign term like paid search keywords. Value must match Regex pattern to be recorded

verification_code.description: Email verification code (received from a `verify_email` call, which must be done first).

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field. Maximum size is 3500 bytes.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
